game.name: Floyd's Cafe
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Build your dream cafe and make an assortment of drinks at Floyd's Cafe! Floyd's Cafe is primarily about well Floyd's cafe... Make anything from black tea to Moka pot coffee or even just a lame old coffee maker. Decorate the Cafe with Vines, shelfs, and even cactuses.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your dream cafe and make an assortment of drinks at Floyd's Cafe! Floyd's Cafe is primarily about well Floyd's cafe... Make anything from black tea to Moka pot coffee or even just a lame old coffee maker. Decorate the Cafe with Vines, shelfs, and even cactuses.
